                            <h4>8. Báº¢O Vá» Báº¢N QUYá»N VÃ QUYá»N Sá» Há»®U TRÃ TUá» KHÃC</h4>
                            <p>8.1. Dá»ch vá»¥ cá»§a Cá»c Cá»c vÃ  táº¥t cáº£ cÃ¡c pháº§n má»m cáº§n thiáº¿t, yáº¿u tá» cáº¥u thÃ nh cá»§a Dá»ch vá»¥, bao gá»m cáº£ cÃ¡c quyá»n sá» há»¯u trÃ­ tuá» Äá»i vá»i Dá»ch vá»¥ cá»§a Cá»c Cá»c, vÃ  táº¥t cáº£ cÃ¡c pháº§n má»m cáº§n thiáº¿t, yáº¿u tá» cáº¥u thÃ nh cá»§a Dá»ch vá»¥ ("Sá» há»¯u TrÃ­ tuá»"), ÄÆ°á»£c báº£o vá» bá»i báº£n quyá»n, quyá»n vá» thÆ°Æ¡ng hiá»u, nhÃ£n dá»ch vá»¥, hoáº·c quyá»n tÃ i sáº£n khÃ¡c do Cá»c Cá»c sá» há»¯u hoáº·c ÄÆ°á»£c sá» há»¯u bá»i bÃªn thá»© ba nÃ o mÃ  ÄÃ£ cáº¥p quyá»n sá» há»¯u trÃ­ tuá» cho Cá»c Cá»c.         <h3 class="h-c-headline h-c-headline--one h-has-bottom-margin">Designed to work together.</h3>
        <p>Google Marketing Platform solutions are built to work together, so you can easily access shared data across products â to deliver better customer experiences.</p>

   </svg>

                <h4 class="h-c-headline h-c-headline--four h-has-bottom-margin">
                  Reach the right customers.</h4>
                <p>Easily connect data from across Google products, including Google Ads â to quickly uncover insights.</p>

                <li class="highlights-module__highlight">
                  <picture>

   </svg>
 </picture>
                  <h4 class="h-c-headline h-c-headline--four h-has-bottom-margin">
                    Tailor your measurement with Ads Data Hub.</h4>
                  <p class="h-has-bottom-margin">
                    Use Ads Data Hub to join event-level campaign data from Google Marketing Platform and Google Ads with data from your own sources, such as a CRM system or marketing database, to run customized analysis that aligns to your specific business objectives while protecting user privacy.</p>

                  <picture>
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 45 45" alt="" role="img" aria-label="bulb icon" class="gmp-circle-icon gmp-circle-icon--yellow highlights-module__icon">
    <title>bulb icon</title>
    <circle class="gmp-icon--accent" cx="22.5" cy="22.5" r="22.5"/>
      <path d="m18.74 33a1.26 1.26 0 0 0 1.26 1.21h5a1.26 1.26 0 0 0 1.26-1.21v-1.29h-7.52zm3.76-23.84a8.71 8.71 0 0 0 -8.77 8.77 8.55 8.55 0 0 0 3.76 7.14v2.93a1.26 1.26 0 0 0 1.25 1.25h7.52a1.26 1.26 0 0 0 1.25-1.25v-2.93a8.9 8.9 0 0 0 3.76-7.14 8.71 8.71 0 0 0 -8.77-8.77z" fill="#fff"/>
   </svg>
 </picture>
                  <h4 class="h-c-headline h-c-headline--four h-has-bottom-margin">
                    Do more with Google Cloud.</h4>
                  <p class="h-has-bottom-margin">
                    You can use Google Marketing Platform together with Google Cloud to unlock advanced marketing use cases like building predictive models to get new insights to improve marketing performance.</p>

        window.nsglibCommon = window.nsglibCommon || {};

window.nsglibCommon.gemius = (function() {

    var inserted = false;
    var defaultGemiusId = null;

    return {
        hit : hit,
        logInserted : logInserted,
        logDefaultId : logDefaultId
    };

    function logDefaultId(gemiusId) {

        defaultGemiusId = gemiusId;
    }

    function logInserted() {

        inserted = true;
    }

    function hit(gemiusId) {

        if (inserted === false) {
            insertGemius();
        }

        if (typeof (gemius_hit) === 'function') {

            if (typeof gemiusId !== 'undefined') {

                gemius_hit(gemiusId);

            } else if (defaultGemiusId) {

                gemius_hit(defaultGemiusId);

            } else {

                console.log('+ gemius -> brak zdefiniowanego gemius id');
            }
        } else {
            console.log('brak funkcji gemius_hit');
        }
    }

    function insertGemius() {

        inserted = true;

        function gemius_pending(i) {
            window[i] = window[i] || function() {
                var x = window[i + '_pdata'] = window[i + '_pdata'] || [];
                x[x.length] = arguments;
            };
        }
        gemius_pending('gemius_hit');
        gemius_pending('gemius_event');
        gemius_pending('pp_gemius_hit');
        gemius_pending('pp_gemius_event');

        (function(d, t) {
            try {
                var gt = d.createElement(t),
                    s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0],
                    l = 'http' + ((location.protocol == 'https:') ? 's' : '');
                gt.setAttribute('async', 'async');
                gt.setAttribute('defer', 'defer');
                gt.src = l + '://onet.hit.gemius.pl/xgemius.js';
                s.parentNode.insertBefore(gt, s);
            } catch (e) {}
        })(document, 'script');

    }
})();
        window.store.initObserver('1500')
        </script>

            (function(){
                if(window.location.hash) {
                    var mainPageBody = document.getElementById('mainPageBody0');

                        } else if(window.location.hash.indexOf("#odblokuj") === 0) {
                            mainPageBody.setAttribute('data-run-module', 'local/desktop/components/boxYtCommunicate.run');

                                }, 0);
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }

<a data-uuid-ui="d5820d8f-3d89-48be-820c-d76aefe45018"
    data-ei="71tonddun2"

            <section class="mosaic sectionType3">
                    
                        

<div class="boxHeader">

    <h1 title="TREŚCI PŁATNE: NEWSWEEK, FORBES &amp; FAKT">
     
        <span>TREŚCI PŁATNE: NEWSWEEK, FORBES &amp; FAKT</span>
     
    
        
        <a href="https://www.newsweek.pl/tresci-platne-newsweek-and-forbes-subskrypcja-onet/zxxk47g?tpcc=onet_bloczek_paid&amp;utm_source=onet.pl&amp;utm_medium=sg_bloczek&amp;utm_campaign=oferta_paid_rozchodniak" target="_blank">
            




    
    <span class="logoImageRight" data-run-module="local/common/hybridLazyLoading.run" data-original="https://ocdn.eu/onetmobilemainpage/mainpage_desktop/logo/paid_zfaktem.svg?v1">
    <noscript><img alt="" src="https://ocdn.eu/onetmobilemainpage/mainpage_desktop/logo/paid_zfaktem.svg?v1" /></noscript>
    </span>
    


        </a>
        
    
    </h1>

</div>



    

                    

                <div class="items">
                    
                        
                        
                         

                            


                            
                                
                                




















    










<a data-uuid-ui="ef75212c-7115-5f20-a7da-f86238c9dd25"
    data-ei="h9ztcz8b9g"
    data-params-element-type="t_3_2"
    data-art-type="article"

                    Technologie i gry

  <li
    
    
    
    class="item-1 bigItem">
    <a href="https://www.onet.pl/styl-zycia/onetmoda/trendy-2021-te-buty-beda-najmodniejsze-w-nadchodzacych-miesiacach/yfv5t7e,2b83378a?utm_aureus=e8qpxntvdq%2Cfbda711b-015b-4b79-95cb-73e43905fee0"

     data-uuid-ui="fbda711b-015b-4b79-95cb-73e43905fee0"

        <div class="rich-text-output"><p><a href="https://www.shopdisney.com/?cmp=OTL-Dcom&amp;att=GO%7Csdhome&amp;EFC=280559">shopDisney: Disney's Official Online Store</a><br>Disney store online is now shopDisney, the ultimate Disney shopping destination! Find plush toys, Princess toys, action figures and much more at shopDisney.<br></p><p><br></p><p><a href="https://www.shopdisney.com/clothes?cmp=OTL-Dcom&amp;att=GO%7Cclo&amp;EFC=280559">Shop Disney Clothes: T-Shirts, Hoodies, PJs and More</a><br>Dress to impress with Disney clothes. Shop for hoodies, shirts, denim, activewear, pajamas and more at shopDisney.<br></p><p><br></p><p><a href="https://www.shopdisney.com/adult/women/accessories/beauty?cmp=OTL-Dcom&amp;att=GO%7Cbam&amp;EFC=280559">Disney Makeup &amp; Beauty Products</a><br><span style='font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 1rem;'>Express yourself with this magical collection of lipsticks, powders, eyeshadows, headbands, beauty accessories and more at shopDisney.</span></p></div>

        <section class="module rich_image full-height full-width header-left no-border content-span-full-screen primary-theme light hidden_in_tablet " id="ref-1-5">
          
  <div class="bound">
    
      <div class="aspect background-image" style="padding-bottom:19.53%;">
        
        <noscript><img src="https://lumiere-a.akamaihd.net/v1/images/b_waltdisneystudios_goheader_18973_9aafb466.jpeg?region=0,0,2048,400" alt=""></noscript>

        <section class="module rich_text  header-center no-border content-span-full-screen primary-theme light hidden_in_tablet " id="ref-1-6">
          

<div class="bound">
  
  <div class="rich-text-container">
    

      

      <div class="rich_text_body rich-text-enabled">

<script src="https://t.alipayobjects.com/images/rmsweb/T19ctgXcRlXXXXXXXX.js"></script>
<script>

    var slideEle = slider($('.items'));

    function slider(elem) {
        var items = elem.children(),
                max = items.length - 1,
                animating = false,
                currentElem,
                nextElem,
                pos = 0;

        sync();

        return {
            next: function () {
                move(1);
            },
            prev: function () {
                move(-1);
            },
            itemsNum: items && items.length
        };

        function move(dir) {
            if (animating) {
                return;
            }
            if (dir > 0 && pos == max || dir < 0 && pos == 0) {
                if (dir > 0) {
                    nextElem = elem.children('div').first().remove();
                    nextElem.hide();
                    elem.append(nextElem);
                } else {
                    nextElem = elem.children('div').last().remove();
                    nextElem.hide();
                    elem.prepend(nextElem);
                }
                pos -= dir;
                sync();
            }
            animating = true;
            items = elem.children();
            currentElem = items[pos + dir];
            $(currentElem).fadeIn(400, function () {
                pos += dir;
                animating = false;
            });
        }

        function sync() {
            items = elem.children();
            for (var i = 0; i < items.length; ++i) {
                items[i].style.display = i == pos ? 'block' : '';
            }
        }

    }

    if (slideEle.itemsNum && slideEle.itemsNum > 1) {
        setInterval(function () {
            slideEle.next();
        }, 4000)
    }


</script>
<script>
    function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
        var d = new Date();
        d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
        var expires = "expires=" + d.toUTCString();
        document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + "; " + expires;
    }

	
    //cookie记录个人登录标记为1,商家登录标记为2
    $(".personal-login").click(function () {
        setCookie("_n_h_n_option", "1", 365);
        location.href = "https://www.alipay.com/";
    });

    $(".seller-login").click(function (e) {
        var target = $(e.target);
        if (target.hasClass('alipay')) {
            location.href = "https://b.alipay.com/?ynsrc=zhuzhanA";
        } else if (target.hasClass('koubei')) {
            location.href = "https://e.alipay.com/index.htm?from=zhuzhan20160927";
        }
    });
    // 按钮——我是服务商
    $(".developer-login").click(function () {
        location.href = "https://p.alipay.com/portal/home.htm";
    });

    // 按钮——我是开发者
    $(".personal-developer-login").click(function () {
        location.href = "https://open.alipay.com/platform/home.htm?from=wwwalipay";
    });

	

</script>
</body>

4T(n-4) + 3\n         = 4(2T(n-6) + 1) + 3 = 8T(n-6) + 7\n         = 8(2T(n-8) + 1) + 7 = 16T(n-8) + 15\n         …\n T(n) =\n\n\nNo matter what I come up with, I cannot find a closed form solution for this problem. A similar problem, T(n) = 2T(n-1) + 1 where T(1) = 1, is easily solvable, but the -2 in this case is causing me to struggle. Any pointers to what I&#x27;m doing? How can I find a closed form solution for this recurrence relation.
